definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian skylark (Alauda arvensis)
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
(bird species of China) oriental skylark (Alauda gulgula)

sentences.english: Are you the skylark in my dream?
There are always skylarks , their songs hanging over the field of dark gold.
sentences.chinese: 在深金色的田野上空總有飛翔的雲雀以及他們的歌聲。

sentences.english: But a lark is really the best thing to get up with.
sentences.chinese: 其實跟着雲雀起牀纔是再好不過的。

sentences.english: The sky was blue, the larks was soaring high over the green corn.
sentences.chinese: 長天一片澄藍，碧綠的莊稼上雲雀凌空穿飛。

sentences.english: Lovers live by love,as larks live by leeks.
sentences.chinese: 情侶靠愛情生活，正象雲雀靠韭蔥生活一樣。

sentences.english: A Skylark wounded in the wing.
The larks were singing and beautiful spring had come.
sentences.chinese: 清晨時分，侏儒在雲雀的歌聲中醒來。

sentences.english: I saw and heard a skylark fly between the two.
sentences.chinese: 我看見，聽到一隻雲雀飛翔在藍天碧野之間。

sentences.english: Then the lark is so brimful of gladness and love.
sentences.chinese: 這時雲雀滿懷着喜悅和愛。

sentences.english: If the sky falls, we shall catches larks .
The poem is entitled Ode to Skylark .
sentences.chinese: 這首詩的題目是《雲雀頌》。

sentences.english: Humans can choose to be night owls or morning larks.
sentences.chinese: 人類可以選作夜間貓頭鷹或晨起雲雀。

sentences.english: The lover live by loving as same as lark live by shallot.
sentences.chinese: 情侶靠感情生活，正象雲雀靠韭蔥生活相同。

sentences.english: Lark in sky merrily merrily merrily to welcome in the Year.
sentences.chinese: 天上的雲雀，滿心喜悅，歡天喜地，迎接新年到。

definition: white whale/beluga/Moby Dick, novel by Herman Melville 赫曼·麥爾維爾|赫曼·麦尔维尔[He4 man4 · Mai4 er3 wei2 er3]
Sendai, capital of Miyagi prefecture 宮城縣|宫城县[Gong1 cheng2 xian4] in northeast Japan
Master of the Nets Garden in Suzhou, Jiangsu
the feeling of actually being there
ibis/Japanese crested ibis (Nipponia nippon)/same as 朱鹮
